title: What Happened to Curiosity? (Part 2 - Continuation)

kevinTribalTransactionStory.context: Cherokee vs Choctaw differences in transactionality
kevinTribalTransactionStory.choctaw: Want Choctaw to run their business - much more transactional commercial folks
kevinTribalTransactionStory.cherokee: Cherokee Nation much more transactional than Eastern Bend
kevinTribalTransactionStory.withinDifferences: Even within Cherokee Nation, differences in formations
kevinTribalTransactionStory.probingRule: Fastest way to go slower with a tribe is to probe - they say they're going off to think, you wait
kevinTribalTransactionStory.campProtocol: Don't get welcome to the camp if you come into the camp. You get visible. Then you wait, and you get invited when it's time to invite you.
kevinTribalTransactionStory.kevinHonesty: 'Drives me fucking crazy, but that's what you have to do'

intimacyGradients.gilMaryland: Friend lived in rural northwestern Maryland - 20 years before invited from porch into house (friendly conversations on porch, but that's where it was)
intimacyGradients.kevinBarcelona: Friends in Barcelona get invited to cafes, but not to the houses
intimacyGradients.jerryFramework: Senses of what is... intimacy gradient - who would you invite to bedroom, living room, porch, block party? Series of concentric rings.
intimacyGradients.cultural: Each culture, within each person has different settings for who gets to be where
intimacyGradients.framingVariation: In this ring okay to talk about this kind of stuff, not further out
intimacyGradients.extremes: People who live their lives fully in public and have no rings, apparently

alexNeedToKnow.faceBlindness: If I see you in another Zoom group, I will not recognize any of you - out of context, different entities
alexNeedToKnow.coreRule: Will not use anything, or do anything, or travel in anything, where I don't understand how it works
alexNeedToKnow.examples: I know how cars work. I know how jets work. Looked through manual of 747 jet engine when I was 15.
alexNeedToKnow.motivation: Feel the need to know. Wouldn't get on a plane without no notice.
alexNeedToKnow.innerCuriosity: That is the inner curiosity that some people have
alexNeedToKnow.socialPattern: I talk to everyone. I talk to everyone so much. I have no barrier. I will ask them anything.
alexNeedToKnow.britishReserve: British people very reserved - not difficult to cross the barrier for weather, anything not important. As soon as you ask remotely personal, goes out the window. I upset a lot of strangers, that's okay.

brexitShock.context: Sitting at lunch with young people 22-24 during Brexit years
brexitShock.alexAttempt: Started talking about Brexit, political, sensitive
brexitShock.theirResponse: All three turned around and said 'we don't watch the news'
brexitShock.alex: But it's a big thing, don't you care?
brexitShock.them: No. Did you vote? No, we just don't care. We're just not interested.
brexitShock.alexReaction: 'Profoundly shocked me that there are people in this world that are like that. So incurious.'

aiBreakthrough.problem: Could never understand when teacher told me something - comprehension not quite right. Too embarrassed to ask clarifying questions - got annoying to teacher after 3 times at different angles
aiBreakthrough.solution: Since ChatGPT came along - Oh. Fantastic. I ask same question in different ways, and eventually I understand it.
aiBreakthrough.benefit: Brilliant. Wonder whether kids may benefit. Don't feel dumb asking same question to AI 50 different times.
aiBreakthrough.proposal: Wonder whether that would improve things - teacher and AI to support the teaching

jerrySmallTalkHistory.book: 'Roads to Power' - about first turnpikes in England
jerrySmallTalkHistory.preContext: Before turnpikes, nobody knew whole country, no map, only knew road to next town
jerrySmallTalkHistory.invention: When you start getting roads, carriage rides - first time strangers contained in small space
jerrySmallTalkHistory.smallTalkOrigin: Have to invent things like 'oh, lovely weather outside' - small talk invented in that culture for close confines of long travel in carriage
jerrySmallTalkHistory.cultural: Pervades cultures in all sorts of different ways, probably showed up other ways other places

klausCommonsPersona.shift: We have been reviewing individual curiosity, but there's also a commons persona
klausCommonsPersona.brexitExample: How was Brexit possible? Because there was...
klausCommonsPersona.implication: Collective curiosity vs individual curiosity - group-level phenomenon

peteAISafety.context: Responding to Alex's AI learning tool
peteAISafety.petesApproach: Using ChatGPT for health advice - knows health systems, medicine, how it works
peteAISafety.safetyFramework: Can ask penetrating questions: 'Are you sure you thought about this or that?' Feel safe to navigate
peteAISafety.warning: Wouldn't recommend to most people. Don't do it at home.
peteAISafety.washingtonPost: Shocking reading about people using these technologies with no clue how it works, getting tricked - not because thing trying to trick, but in context where don't have enough information

louiseAIEducation.benefits: So many benefits - have small classes of 24 students, but individual focused attention challenging
louiseAIEducation.vision: If have AI bot that can respond, lead, assess and move them on - individual students moving at individual pace
louiseAIEducation.concern: Pete gave me concern - have to have confidence AI capable. Maybe in focused topic/subject, AI could lead students through learning experience
louiseAIEducation.insight: Curiosity so multifaceted - I may not recognize curiosity from student about this maths lesson, but they probably do have curiosity in some area engrossing for them. Mustn't judge them just in environment of my classroom and maths. Very helpful today.
louiseAIEducation.brexitFilm: Benedict Cumberbatch plays Dominic Cummings - explores ways they managed to influence and convince public to exit

johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.noticing: One ideas of curiosity was noticing things you don't absolutely have to notice. You may notice I'm in different context than earlier
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.revelation: Actually in a hyperbaric chamber - just under 2 atmospheres, about 46% oxygen
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.purpose: Nominally therapeutic benefits for certain disease conditions, but also as longevity or cognitive enhancement tool - that's how I'm using it
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.fiveWhys: Classic technique - keep asking why, why, take apart each answer, don't accept as ultimate why
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.overFocusWarning: Possible to over-focus on why when haven't done previous work about what and how
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.howVsWhy: How is more neutral version of why. Why assumes motivation, human actor. Good for mystery story, but other kinds of collaborative coherence of causes you might not notice unless you said how instead of why, and what first.
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.militantlyUncurious: Had plenty of militantly uncurious students - first-gen college, mill town, career goal to become shop teacher
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.laminating: When I started talking about communication, they said 'When are we gonna laminate?' Had pictures of motorcycles they wanted to laminate. This is college.
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.socialContext: If you created a context where there's social reason for participating and pursuing question like five whys, they'll participate for social reason
johnKellyHyperbaricChamber.sideEffect: Down the road, get benefit - 'oh, we actually discovered something we weren't looking for, wouldn't have done it if told to, but did it in context of playing this little game. Now have different perspective.'

kevinCobraStory.disclaimer: Don't try this at home - part of my approach to life or something
kevinCobraStory.context: 25 years ago, Rajasthan at Mughal fort, fakir does random pattern to keep cobra
kevinCobraStory.motivation: Told by woman I was hard to follow in dance, wanted to see how it would be with cobra
kevinCobraStory.experiment: Bought little pipe, got closer, cobra focused on me, did my funky thing
kevinCobraStory.result: Within less than 30 seconds, cobra had me figured out better than Sean McConnell's wife had
kevinCobraStory.plannedExit: Knew what to do with right hand, left leg, spin behind so he was in line of fire, kids watching
kevinCobraStory.noRegrets: Great time. Moment of being eye-to-eye with cobra is something I would do and don't regret
kevinCobraStory.gladness: Really glad my kids have not seen me as a role model
kevinCobraStory.jerry: 'This is a good non-replicable parenting moment'

staceyNoticingVsCuriosity.blurryLine: Little bit of blurry line between the noticing and the curious
staceyNoticingVsCuriosity.fundamental: 'I just want to remind everybody, we are all curious' - just saying that
staceyNoticingVsCuriosity.noticingProblem: Do believe there are people that just don't notice. May not have ability to notice. If you don't notice in first place, you can't be curious.
staceyNoticingVsCuriosity.distinction: Then there are people that notice and they're not curious - there's a difference there
staceyNoticingVsCuriosity.jerryResponse: So much of all of this is about how we direct our attention, or how we mind our attention, or what we pay attention to - only that will direct us to be curious and give us the avenue

victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.source: Right Question Institute methodology from some years ago
victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.proposal: I think we need to do something like that - with good focus question, start asking questions first
victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.process: Playing with questions, prioritize, then decide what to do
victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.assessment: I love the conversation, I've learned a lot. But I don't think we have really start to uncover half of what curiosity is about.
victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.critique: Because we were explaining our hypotheses instead of asking questions
fourRules: Ask as many questions as you can
Do not stop to answer, judge, or discuss
Write down every question exactly as stated

greekMythologyExample.context: Informal seminar among people interested in learning about Greek mythology
greekMythologyExample.original: One person preparing theme for next session, people would come with questions - nobody did, nobody asked, of course
greekMythologyExample.afterTechnique: Had so many questions, able to really go in direction we wanted
greekMythologyExample.ending: Lists of questions, prioritize them, decide what to do with them
greekMythologyExample.outcomes: Some people: 'I want to research the hero/heroine difference, I want to go through this other path' - each one decided
greekMythologyExample.result: Instead of having standardized sessions (topics everybody talks about), really enriched for everybody

victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.processEnd: Question formulation technique does not end in list of questions. Ends when you decide to prioritize questions and what to do with first three questions in your list.
victoriaQuestionFormulationTechnique.excalidrawContinuation: Can be opened longer, anybody who wants to continue conversation there, that would be great

culturalPatterns.probingTaboos: Kevin: Fastest way to go slower with tribe is to probe. Gil: Maryland 20 years from porch to house.
culturalPatterns.intimacyRings: Jerry: Bedroom → living room → porch → block party. Kevin: Barcelona cafes but not houses.
